about_the_game:
In the Square Inertia Demo, you control this square that can go pretty fast.

This demo features the first 20 levels in addition to the first 5 levels from the second section of the game.
Save progress from this demo should transfer over to the full game.
detailed_description:
In the Square Inertia Demo, you control this square that can go pretty fast.

This demo features the first 20 levels in addition to the first 5 levels from the second section of the game.
Save progress from this demo should transfer over to the full game.
name: Square Inertia Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Try to set the fastest times possible in Square Inertia: a fast-paced, momentum-based precision platformer. Race through 20 of the first 25 levels and 5 of the next 25 levels. All progress from this demo should transfer to the full game.
